title: Assessing and Treating an Adolescent With OCD
itunes:title: Assessing and Treating an Adolescent With OCD
description:
Sharpen your clinical skills with a clinical case of an adolescent girl with OCD. This episode also reviews the progression and consequences of the patient’s symptoms, the diagnosis, and the best treatment options for improving her symptoms. 

Faculty: David Rosenberg, M.D. 
Host: Jessica Diaz, M.D.

  • Learn more about our memberships here
  • Earn 1 CME: OCD in Children and Adolescents
  • Assessing and Treating Jane
